it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.model.resourcepacket

Class Packet

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.model.resourcepacket.Packet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Printable, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<Unit>

    public class Packet
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<Unit>, Printable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable
    This class is a container of Units and is used as the basic Resource reference in all the Game
    Author:
    Luca Napoletano, Claudio Montanari
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Packet

        public Packet()
        Default Constructor, builds an empty Packet

      • Packet

        public Packet(java.util.Map<Resource,java.lang.Integer> resource)
        Special Constructor, builds a Packet starting from a Map
        Parameters:
        resource - is a Map where key is Resource type and value is Resource quantity

    • Method Detail

      • getPacket

        public java.util.List<Unit> getPacket()
        Getter method used to return the list of unit that belongs to the Packet
        Returns:
        The list of Unit that belongs to the Packet

      • addUnit

        public void addUnit(Unit unit)
        Method used to sum a Unit to the current Packet of Resources
        Parameters:
        unit - the Unit to sum to the Packet

      • isGreater

        public boolean isGreater(Packet packet)
        Method used to confront two Packets, return true if current Packet contains all the Resources of the passed Packet
        Parameters:
        packet - the Packet that is used to make the confront
        Returns:
        true if the Packet contains at least all the Resources of the Packet passed

      • search

        private int search(Resource resource)
            throws ElementNotFoundException
        Private method used to search a unit in a Packet, used as support to add and confront operations
        Parameters:
        resource - the Resource unit to search in the Packet
        Returns:
        the index of the unit passed if that exist otherwise throws an Exception
        Throws:
        ElementNotFoundException - if the Resource passed is not contained in the Packet

      • removeUnit

        public void removeUnit(Unit unit)
                throws ElementNotFoundException
        Method used to remove a unit to the current Packet if is contained in it
        Parameters:
        unit - the Unit to subtract
        Throws:
        ElementNotFoundException - if the Packet does not contains the Unit passed

      • subtractUnit

        public void subtractUnit(Unit unitToSubtract)
        Method used to subtract a Unit to the Packet, if the quantity of that unit is not sufficient then the quantity is automatically set to zero
        Parameters:
        unitToSubtract - the Unit that will be subtracted to the Packet
